name: Snurt's Quest
description:
Description:

Lord Brownmoor was a legend of mythic proportions,

Famed adventurer,

Brave,

Strong,

Confident,

And, above all else, children looked up to him.

Snurt is none of these things.

But, after a terrible accident befalls our trusted adventurer, he's sadly all we have. 

Armed with Brownmoor's crossbow,

Holding Brownmoor's trusty treasure map,

And possessing neither his skill nor talent.

Snurt will have to be extremely lucky to survive the adventure that awaits.

How to play

Snurt is controlable using the WASD/Arrow Keys, and the crossbow is aimed using the mouse and shot with the left mouse. The goal of each level is to avoid the obstacles and enemies to reach the treasure. You have a limited number of arrows you can collect each level, and must choose wisely whether you want to use it to destroy the enemy or a destructable wall.

Status

Snurt's Quest is a game which was made in one week for Blackthornpro GAME JAM #3, but was not submitted in time. It's been sitting on my hard drive for all this time so we figured we might as well publish it. It was made in a week and is very buggy and unpolished in certain areas, so be careful.

Credits

This game was made in 7 days by the following awesome people:

  • Callum Clayton - 3D Artist
  • Rupert Cole - Audio Composer
  • Fraser Rees - Game Designer
  • Rahul Sharma - Programmer
